TECH_LIST.TITLE: Some techs that I have used

ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: Hi there! My name is Jeffer Peng. I am an undergrad student majoring in Computer Science at University of Waterloo.
ABOUT_ME.EXPERIENCES_DESCRIPTION: Experienced in full stack development, algorithms and data structures, and Object Oriented programming. I always bring 100% to the work I do and I am not afraid to take initiative and seek new challenges.
ABOUT_ME.Name: Name

DESCRIPTION_1.TITLE: Lead full-stack development for COVID-Net platform in React and python to provide AI screening and risk stratification of COVID-19 to 23 hospitals
DESCRIPTION_1.D1_D1: Built DICOM image viewer in React to perform drag, zoom, invert, and window/level on image
DESCRIPTION_1.D1_D2: Developed all React components in function component with hooks and context to greatly reduce amount of code by >10%
DESCRIPTION_1.D1_D3: Developed containerized ChRIS backend plugins in python to run COVID-Net ML models and generate analysis results in PDF

GENSYNTH.TITLE: Contributed to development of company's core product using Angular6, Node and completed 5 major features and 30 minor feature/bug fix tickets
GENSYNTH.D1: Revamped and Implemented new job visualization UI using directed graph to accommodate new key feature and increased test coverage by 10%
GENSYNTH.D2: Implemented delete api on model training cycles using Node, Objection.ts to allow users to free up database and server memory

DESCRIPTION_1.TITLE: Prototyped in a small team the full stack of Object Model Mapper with react for BSAs to automate object modeling process. Distributed the app in both web-based and standalone desktop versions.
DESCRIPTION_1.D1_D1: Utilized MongoDB to store data for web-based version and used Node to store data as files for desktop version
DESCRIPTION_1.D1_D2: The desktop version is built by packaging the react app using Electron and having the server as a dependency

DESCRIPTION_2.TITLE: Developed the full stack of two Angular Proof of Concepts(POC) apps both independently and in small agile teams for bank clients
DESCRIPTION_2.D2_D1: Angular POC 1 helps Payment Service Providers to register with the bank client through a set of registration proccess
DESCRIPTION_2.D2_D2: Angular POC 2 helps HR to automate the onboarding process of new employees and see employees' progress in registration
DESCRIPTION_2.D2_D3: Example Feature: Implemented elastic search algorithm in backend for type ahead searches in angular app
